metadata.Title: CVE-2021-26925 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Roundcube before 1.4.11 allows XSS via crafted Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) token sequences during HTML email rendering.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-26925` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-core - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.11+dfsg.1-4').
